title: 麻烦大家来看一下
author: 你个老伙计
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
WARNING: coremods are present:
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge
// I let you down. Sorry :(
Time: 16-7-24 上午7:39
Description: Exception in server tick loop
java.lang.NoSuchFieldError: field_71312_k
 at net.minecraft.server.integrated.IntegratedServer.func_71247_a(SourceFile:71)
 at net.minecraft.server.integrated.IntegratedServer.func_71197_b(SourceFile:128)
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:441)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- System Details --
Details:
 Minecraft Version: 1.8.9
 Operating System: Windows 8.1 (amd64) version 6.3
 CPU: 4x Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4210U CPU @ 1.70GHz
 Java Version: 1.7.0_75, Oracle Corporation
 Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
 Memory: 491369768 bytes (468 MB) / 810029056 bytes (772 MB) up to 1060372480 bytes (1011 MB)
 JVM Flags: 7 total; -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+CMSIncrementalMode -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmn128m -Xmx1024m
 IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
 FML: MCP 9.19 Powered by Forge 11.15.1.1722 Optifine OptiFine_1.8.9_HD_U_H6 8 mods loaded, 8 mods active
 States: 'U' = Unloaded 'L' = Loaded 'C' = Constructed 'H' = Pre-initialized 'I' = Initialized 'J' = Post-initialized 'A' = Available 'D' = Disabled 'E' = Errored
 UCHIJA mcp{9.19} [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) 
 UCHIJA FML{8.0.99.99} [Forge Mod Loader] (forge-1.8.9-11.15.1.1722.jar) 
 UCHIJA Forge{11.15.1.1722} [Minecraft Forge] (forge-1.8.9-11.15.1.1722.jar) 
 UCHIJA JEI{2.28.9.176} [Just Enough Items] (jei_1.8.9-2.28.9.176.jar) 
 UCHIJA MSM3{3.1.0.123} [More Swords 3] (MoreSwords-1.8.9-3.1.0.123.jar) 
 UCHIJA cfm{3.6} [MrCrayfish's Furniture Mod] (MrCrayfishFurnitureModv3.6.1(1.8.9).jar) 
 UCHIJA VeinMiner{0.34.1_1.8.9-9901a41} [Vein Miner] (VeinMiner-0.34.1-1.8.9r552+9901a41.jar) 
 UCHIJA VeinMinerModSupport{0.34.1_1.8.9-9901a41} [Mod Support] (VeinMiner-0.34.1-1.8.9r552+9901a41.jar) 
 Loaded coremods (and transformers): 
 GL info: ~~ERROR~~ RuntimeException: No OpenGL context found in the current thread.
 Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
 Player Count: 0 / 8; []
 Type: Integrated Server (map_client.txt)
 Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'fml,forge'
 OptiFine Version: OptiFine_1.8.9_HD_U_H6
 Render Distance Chunks: 12
 Mipmaps: 4
 Anisotropic Filtering: 1
 Antialiasing: 0
 Multitexture: false
 Shaders: KUDA-Shaders v5 Ultra - Preview 2.zip
 OpenGlVersion: 4.3.0 - Build 20.19.15.4444
 OpenGlRenderer: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4400
 OpenGlVendor: Intel
 CpuCount: 4




以上为崩溃报告，游戏能进入，但进入世界就闪退。。。。。

replies.txt_content: 楼主是不是装了什么世界生成的mod，单看这个崩溃文件看不出问题

replies.author: 你个老伙计
replies.txt_content:
1164816764 发表于 2016-7-24 13:52
楼主是不是装了什么世界生成的mod，单看这个崩溃文件看不出问题
没有啊。。不过我已经找到原因了~~~是因为皮肤模组有问题，应该是和鞘翅模组冲突了
